Title: The Garden of Eden
Writer: Alessandro D'Alatri (story), Alessandro D'Alatri (screenplay), Miro Silvera (screenplay)
Actors: Kim Rossi Stuart, Boris Terral, Kassandra Voyagis, Saïd Taghmaoui
Plot: A look at Jesus Christ's life, from his childhood to the meeting with the Apostles, focusing on his compassionate human side.
